mapper.sql: id, studentid, name, sex, award, score, moral, intellectual, physical, schoolid, remark
mapper.select: select id, studentid, name, sex, award, score, moral, intellectual, physical, schoolid, remark from student where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into student (id, studentid, name, sex, award, score, moral, intellectual, physical, schoolid, remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{award,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moral,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intellectual,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{physical,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update student
studentid = #{studentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
award = #{award,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
